change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 269/2019, effective December 16, 2019.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Land and improvements owned by the Waneta Expansion General Partner Limited are exempt from 49% of the taxes described under section 31 (3) of the Columbia Basin Trust Act for the 2013 and subsequent taxation years if included in a power generation, transmission or distribution facility constructed in whole or in part by or on behalf of the Columbia Basin Trust.
An exemption of land or an improvement under section 1 is rescinded if

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the land or the improvement is not owned by the Waneta Expansion General Partner Limited, or
the combined ownership interest of 2 or more of the following in either the Waneta Expansion General Partner Limited or the Waneta Expansion Limited Partnership is less than 49%:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: Columbia Basin Trust or a subsidiary of Columbia Basin Trust;
Columbia Power Corporation or a subsidiary of Columbia Power Corporation;

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Columbia Basin Trust Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 53, section 31 (3)]
